content:
222
A SUBSEQUENTLY FOUND WILL
(1) If a will is found after the finality of a decree of distribution, the court shall proclaim the will and send it to the probate court, and keep a copy of the will.
(2) The probate court shall not carry out another probate hearing; instead, it shall notify those affected of the proclamation of the will and inform them that they may enforce their rights deriving from the will in a law suit.
